scripts.generate-parser: mkdirp src.generated/soql-completion-parser; cp soql-grammar/*.ts ./src.generated/soql-completion-parser; antlr4ts -visitor -Xexact-output-dir -o src.generated/soql-completion-parser soql-grammar/SoqlLexer.g4; cd src.generated/soql-completion-parser && antlr4ts -visitor -Xexact-output-dir -o . ../../soql-grammar/SoqlParser.g4
scripts.fix-generated-parser-ts-errors: rexreplace 'public get serializedATN' '\/* @ts-ignore *\/\npublic get serializedATN' src.generated/soql-completion-parser/Soql*.ts  && rexreplace 'public get ruleIndex' '\/* @ts-ignore *\/\npublic get ruleIndex' src.generated/soql-completion-parser/SoqlParser.ts && rexreplace 'public _i: SoqlIdentifierContext' 'public _i: SoqlIdentifierContext | undefined' src.generated/soql-completion-parser/SoqlParser.ts
scripts.build: yarn run generate-parser && yarn run fix-generated-parser-ts-errors && yarn run compile
